feature: INSTANTLY THICK, VOLUMINOUS HAIR - IN 60 SECONDS! - Just spray through damp hair then dry for incredible thickness and hair volume - Gives you a layered textured finish with a light hold that looks great and lasts the entire day - The ultimate hair volumizer for fine hair
